archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Service Improvement Plans
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Where appropriate service improvement plans are not available this process is responsible for developing appropriate service improvement plans. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory Where appropriate service improvement plans are not available this process is responsible for developing appropriate service improvement plans.
